full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO SENG GE GDONG CAN LA BRTEN NAS BZLOG PA'I MAN NGAG CHED STAN MTSON CHA ME 'BAR ZHES BYA BA SHIN TU GSANG BA'I GDAMS PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B CES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG BA CAN LA BRTEN PA'I BSRUNG BZLOG GI MAN NGAG CHED STAN MTSON CHA ME 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NYID MKHA' 'GRO'I SNYING KHRAG SHIN TU GSANG BA YIN PAS MANG PO SPEL BA RUNG BAR GYUR BA MA YIN KYANG, SA BYA LOR BLA GRVA TSANG MAR BYAD GTAD KYI GNOD NGO SHIN TU CHE BA'I MTSAN MA GSAL BAR SHAR BZLOG PHYIR, LHAG PA'I LHA LA GNANG BA ZHUS TE 'BRI 'DUN YOD THOG ,RANG GI NYE 'KHOR BA DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG YON TAN NAS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAS MTSAMS @009A *, ,SBYAR TE, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GAM, MING GZHAN MKHA' 'GRO DGYES PA 'PHRIN LAS RDO RJES RANG GI BSTI GNAS SU YI GER BKOD PA LUNG DANG GNANG BA MA THOB PAR RANG DGAR NYAMS SU BLANG NA MKHA' 'GRO KHROS PA'I BKA' CHAD DRAG PO 'BYUNG BAR GDON MI ZA BAS BAG YOD PAR MDZOD CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG
